000: Laughing gas. The hospital is closed a few years ago. Most of the stuff has been auctioned, local youth is trashing the place and stealing everything worth a penny/dime. It would not surprise me if this place will burn down.
013: On the lowest floors it was (pitch)dark, so there wasn't that much destroyed (yet). Like this wall painting.
019: The last picture. It wasn't that exciting. We did meet some vandal kids here. Smoking joints and stealing some copper.
